page.title: 17School: Teacher/Pupil Survey
page.content: Most of the pupils in the school like it here because the teachers aren't too strict and everyone gets along with them. Pupils also like it because we have longer dinner breaks when sport is taking place and because we now have a tuckshop. Pupils who said they didn't like the school don't like school at all. The most liked lessons were P.E. & Music and the most disliked were Art & Maths because they can't do the work and they don't like the teachers. The teachers said they did like the school because it's small, it's in the country and because pupils and teachers get along both during and after school. The teachers said that the only things they don't like are the weather and the poor facilities. Some of the teachers have been here as long as 29yrs and some as short as 5 months.
